changes.description: Updated WordPress pay Gravity Forms library to version 1.3.0.
changes: Added support for Gravity Forms AWeber Add-On version 2.2.1.
Added support for Gravity Forms Campaign Monitor Add-On version 3.3.2.
Added support for Gravity Forms MailChimp Add-On version 3.6.3.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay Membership library to version 1.0.1.
changes: Fixed WordPress callback for the admin settings section.

changes.name: Changed
changes: Improved support for the W3 Total Cache plugin.

changes.name: Fixed
changes: Fix JobRoller class name on admin tab 'Extensions'.

changes.name: Changed
changes: Updated WordPress pay AppThemes library to version 1.0.0.
Updated WordPress pay ClassiPress library to version 1.0.0.
Updated WordPress pay iThemes Exchange library to version 1.1.0.
Updated WordPress pay JobRoller library to version 1.0.0.
Updated WordPress pay Membership library to version 1.0.0.
Updated WordPress pay WP e-Commerce library to version 1.0.0.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay Gravity Forms library to version 1.2.4.
changes: Only process payments if amount is higher than zero.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay Sisow library to version 1.1.0.
changes: Added support for Shop ID.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay Shopp library to version 1.0.2.
changes: Added missing file GatewayModule.php for Shopp < 1.3 support.
Minified all images.
No longer include all development Composer packages.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay MultiSafepay Connect library to version 1.2.1.
changes: Fix fatal error due to undefined var $result.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay core library to version 1.2.1.
changes: Added XML utility class.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay WooCommerce library to version 1.1.2.
changes: Added general Pronamic gateway so the iDEAL gateway can be used for iDEAL only.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay s2Member library to version 1.2.0.
changes: Added experimental support for `ccaps` in shortcode.
Added settings field for the signup confirmation email message.
Added HTML admin views from the Pronamic iDEAL plugin.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay MultiSafepay Connect library to version 1.2.0.
changes: Added support for direct transaction request for iDEAL.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay Event Espresso library to version 1.1.1.
changes: Updated WordPress pay core library to version 1.2.0.
No longer parse HTML input fields but use the new get_output_fields() function.
Added workaround for strange behaviour with 2 config select options.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay Gravity Forms library to version 1.2.3.
changes: Entry with payment status 'Paid' are now also seen as 'approved'.
Use entry ID as default transaction description.
WordPress Coding Standards optimizations.

changes.description: Updated WordPress pay Qantani library to version 1.0.2.
changes: No longer disable SSL verify.

changes.description: Tweak - Updated WordPress pay Easy Digital Downloads library to version 1.1.0.
changes: Added Credit Card gateway.
Added Direct Debit gateway.
Added iDEAL gateway.
Added MiniTix gateway.
Added Bancontact/Mister Cash gateway.
Added SOFORT Banking gateway.
Added gateway setting for the checkout label.
Only show transaction ID if set.
Added pending payment note with link to payment post.
Tested on Easy Digital Downloads version 2.3.

changes.description: Tweak - Updated WordPress pay Event Espresso library to version 1.1.0.
changes: Added experimental support for Event Espresso 4.6 (or higher).

changes.description: Tweak - Updated WordPress pay iDEAL library to version 1.1.0.
changes: Added an utlity class wich can create purchase ID's.

changes.description: Tweak - Updated WordPress pay iDEAL Basic library to version 1.1.0.
changes: Improved support for user defined purchase ID's.

changes.description: Tweak - Updated WordPress pay iDEAL Advanced v3 library to version 1.1.0.
changes: Improved support for user defined purchase ID's.

changes.description: Tweak - Updated WordPress pay iDEAL Advanced library to version 1.1.0.
changes: Improved support for user defined purchase ID's.

Feature - WooCommerce - Credit Card - Added support for Buckaroo.
